summary: This bill, the Military Construction, Veterans Affairs, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026, appropriates funds for military construction projects, the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA), and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026. It allocates significant funding to various VA programs, including medical services, community care, benefits administration, and research. Additional provisions address topics from veterans' healthcare access, construction projects, and policy stipulations, all within specified expenditure regulations. The bill is slated to be addressed by the House of Representatives.
